text: 122.1. Computing Rotational Latency and Bandwidth A disk rotates at a speed of 3600 RPM. If a track holds 64 sectors of 4096 bytes each, how long (in ms) will it take to transfer a full track? (Do not round your answer.) Full track transfer= number (rtol=0.001, atol=1e-0 ms @ What is the maximum bandwidth (in MB/sec) you can get from this device? (Assume you can transfer a full track on every revolution with no seeks. Do not round your answer.) Max bandwith = number (rtol=0.001, atol=1e-0 MB/s @ Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
